35 
36 // BLAS _GEMM wrapper functions
37 
38 template <typename S1, typename T1, typename T2, typename S2, typename T3>
39 inline void gemm(madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE op_a,
40  madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE op_b, const integer m,
41  const integer n, const integer k, const S1 alpha, const T1* a,
42  const integer lda, const T2* b, const integer ldb,
43  const S2 beta, T3* c, const integer ldc) {
44  // Define operations
45  static const unsigned int notrans_notrans = 0x00000000,
46  notrans_trans = 0x00000004,
47  trans_notrans = 0x00000001,
48  trans_trans = 0x00000005,
49  notrans_conjtrans = 0x00000008,
50  trans_conjtrans = 0x00000009,
51  conjtrans_notrans = 0x00000002,
52  conjtrans_trans = 0x00000006,
53  conjtrans_conjtrans = 0x0000000a;
54 
55  // Construct matrix maps for a, b, and c.
56  typedef Eigen::Matrix<T1, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>
57  matrixA_type;
58  typedef Eigen::Matrix<T2, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>
59  matrixB_type;
60  typedef Eigen::Matrix<T3, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::Dynamic, Eigen::RowMajor>
61  matrixC_type;
62  Eigen::Map<const matrixA_type, Eigen::AutoAlign, Eigen::OuterStride<>> A(
63  a, (op_a == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? m : k),
64  (op_a == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? k : m), Eigen::OuterStride<>(lda));
65  Eigen::Map<const matrixB_type, Eigen::AutoAlign, Eigen::OuterStride<>> B(
66  b, (op_b == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? k : n),
67  (op_b == madness::cblas::NoTrans ? n : k), Eigen::OuterStride<>(ldb));
68  Eigen::Map<matrixC_type, Eigen::AutoAlign, Eigen::OuterStride<>> C(
69  c, m, n, Eigen::OuterStride<>(ldc));
70 
71  const bool beta_is_nonzero = (beta != static_cast<S2>(0));
72 
73  switch (op_a | (op_b << 2)) {
74  case notrans_notrans:
75  if (beta_is_nonzero)
76  C.noalias() = alpha * A * B + beta * C;
77  else
78  C.noalias() = alpha * A * B;
79  break;
80  case notrans_trans:
81  if (beta_is_nonzero)
82  C.noalias() = alpha * A * B.transpose() + beta * C;
83  else
84  C.noalias() = alpha * A * B.transpose();
85  break;
86  case trans_notrans:
87  if (beta_is_nonzero)
88  C.noalias() = alpha * A.transpose() * B + beta * C;
89  else
90  C.noalias() = alpha * A.transpose() * B;
91  break;
92  case trans_trans:
93  if (beta_is_nonzero)
94  C.noalias() = alpha * A.transpose() * B.transpose() + beta * C;
95  else
96  C.noalias() = alpha * A.transpose() * B.transpose();
97  break;
98 
99  case notrans_conjtrans:
100  if (beta_is_nonzero)
101  C.noalias() = alpha * A * B.adjoint() + beta * C;
102  else
103  C.noalias() = alpha * A * B.adjoint();
104  break;
105  case trans_conjtrans:
106  if (beta_is_nonzero)
107  C.noalias() = alpha * A.transpose() * B.adjoint() + beta * C;
108  else
109  C.noalias() = alpha * A.transpose() * B.adjoint();
110  break;
111  case conjtrans_notrans:
112  if (beta_is_nonzero)
113  C.noalias() = alpha * A.adjoint() * B + beta * C;
114  else
115  C.noalias() = alpha * A.adjoint() * B;
116  break;
117  case conjtrans_trans:
118  if (beta_is_nonzero)
119  C.noalias() = alpha * A.adjoint() * B.transpose() + beta * C;
120  else
121  C.noalias() = alpha * A.adjoint() * B.transpose();
122  break;
123  case conjtrans_conjtrans:
124  if (beta_is_nonzero)
125  C.noalias() = alpha * A.adjoint() * B.adjoint() + beta * C;
126  else
127  C.noalias() = alpha * A.adjoint() * B.adjoint();
128  break;
129  }
130 }
131 
132 inline void gemm(madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE op_a,
133  madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE op_b, const integer m,
134  const integer n, const integer k, const float alpha,
135  const float* a, const integer lda, const float* b,
136  const integer ldb, const float beta, float* c,
137  const integer ldc) {
138  madness::cblas::gemm(op_b, op_a, n, m, k, alpha, b, ldb, a, lda, beta, c,
139  ldc);
140 }
141 
142 inline void gemm(madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE op_a,
143  madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE op_b, const integer m,
144  const integer n, const integer k, const double alpha,
145  const double* a, const integer lda, const double* b,
146  const integer ldb, const double beta, double* c,
147  const integer ldc) {
148  madness::cblas::gemm(op_b, op_a, n, m, k, alpha, b, ldb, a, lda, beta, c,
149  ldc);
150 }

154  const integer n, const integer k,
155  const std::complex<float> alpha, const std::complex<float>* a,
156  const integer lda, const std::complex<float>* b,
157  const integer ldb, const std::complex<float> beta,
158  std::complex<float>* c, const integer ldc) {
159  madness::cblas::gemm(op_b, op_a, n, m, k, alpha, b, ldb, a, lda, beta, c,
160  ldc);
161 }

163 inline void gemm(madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE op_a,
164  madness::cblas::CBLAS_TRANSPOSE op_b, const integer m,
165  const integer n, const integer k,

167  const std::complex<double>* a, const integer lda,
168  const std::complex<double>* b, const integer ldb,
169  const std::complex<double> beta, std::complex<double>* c,
170  const integer ldc) {
171  madness::cblas::gemm(op_b, op_a, n, m, k, alpha, b, ldb, a, lda, beta, c,
172  ldc);
173 }

175 // BLAS _SCAL wrapper functions
176 
177 template <typename T, typename U>
178 inline typename std::enable_if<detail::is_numeric_v<T>>::type scale(
179  const integer n, const T alpha, U* x) {
180  eigen_map(x, n) *= alpha;
181 }
182 
183 inline void scale(const integer n, const float alpha, float* x) {
184  madness::cblas::scal(n, alpha, x, 1);
185 }
186

188  madness::cblas::scal(n, alpha, x, 1);
189 }

194 }

199 }

210 // BLAS _DOT wrapper functions
211 
212 template <typename T, typename U>
213 T dot(const integer n, const T* x, const U* y) {
214  return eigen_map(x, n).dot(eigen_map(y, n));
215 }
216 
217 inline float dot(integer n, const float* x, const float* y) {
218  return madness::cblas::dot(n, x, 1, y, 1);
219 }
220 
221 inline double dot(integer n, const double* x, const double* y) {
222  return madness::cblas::dot(n, x, 1, y, 1);
223 }
224 
225 inline std::complex<float> dot(integer n, const std::complex<float>* x,
226  const std::complex<float>* y) {
227  return madness::cblas::dot(n, x, 1, y, 1);
228 }
229 
230 inline std::complex<double> dot(integer n, const std::complex<double>* x,
231  const std::complex<double>* y) {
232  return madness::cblas::dot(n, x, 1, y, 1);
233 }
